skill1.name: Strike and Split
skill1.description: 04 launches a surprise attack on the target, causing 70.5% damage to a single enemy target, and has a 35% chance of causing Burn to the target, lasts for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Double-Edged Slash
skill2.description: 04 swings a dual sword attack, causing 66.8% damage to all enemy targets. When fewer than 4 targets are attacked, the damage is increased by 30% for each reduced enemy; if [Double-Edged Slash] kills a target, advance own action bar by 30%.

skill3.name: Overclocked Fox
skill3.description: 04 enters overclocked mode, causing 114.5% damage to all enemy targets. For every 1% of the target's health lost, the damage increases by 0.3%; then gains Attack Buff for 2 rounds. Whenever an enemy target dies on the field, reduce the cooldown of [Overclocked Fox] by 1 round.

skill1.name: Heavy Spear
skill1.description: Inflict damage equal to 100.7% attack power + 4% of own maximum health to a single enemy target. There is a 20% chance to cause Stun for 1 round.

skill2.name: Resolute Shield
skill2.description: Acacia's maximum health is increased by 10%, and takes 8% of the damage allies would be dealt.

skill3.name: Rampart Assault
skill3.description: Inflicts 84.8% damage to all enemy targets with a 35% chance of causing Blind for for 2 rounds. Gives all allies Defense Buff for 1 round, and herself Invincible for 1 round.

skill1.name: Gravitational Collapse
skill1.description: Inflict 84.8% damage to a single enemy target, and advance 1 random ally's action bar by 15%.

skill2.name: Judgement Day Clock
skill2.description: Raises the wand high to make a single ally target other than yourself gain Extra Turn and Attack Buff for 2 Rounds; and advance your own action bar by 20%.
upgrades: Action bar gain is increased by 10%
Action bar gain is increased by 20%

skill3.name: Universal Collapse
skill3.description: Inflict 84.8% damage to all enemy targets, and have a 75% chance to cause Slow to all targets for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Magnetic Rail Shot
skill1.description: Shells an enemy target, causing damage equal to 127.2% attack + 5.3% own maximum health, to a single enemy target with a 50% chance of causing Provoke for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Powered Defense
skill2.description: Andie's defense is increased by 10%. At the end of your turn, you gain 1 Safeguard, which only takes effect from enemies with the highest attack.

skill3.name: Lightweight Armor
skill3.description: Cleanse self, and gain a Barrier equal to 25.8% maximum health and gain Resistance for 3 rounds.

skill1.name: Weak Point Shot
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% of the attack damage to a single enemy target with a 75% chance to dispel 1 buff off the target.

skill2.name: Shattering Thrust
skill2.description: Inflict 143.1% damage to a single enemy target. When the target's health is more than half, it will cause Defense Down for 2 rounds. When the target's health is less than half, repel 40% of the target's action bar.

skill3.name: Before the Storm
skill3.description: Change the energy flow of the battlefield, boost 15% of all allies action bars, and repel all enemy action bars by 15%.

skill1.name: Thunder Prison Halberd
skill1.description: Inflict 106% damage on the enemy target, and has a 70% chance of dispelling 1 of the target's buffs. After the attack, there is a 50% chance of using [Dual Frenzy] for 1 followup attack.

skill2.name: Dual Frenzy
skill2.description: The chance of a dual attack is increased by 7%. Use [Dual Frenzy] for followup, dual attacks and counterattacks. Dual Frenzy: Remove 2 buffs from the target, and cause 127.2% damage to the single target. When the target has no buffs, the damage is increased by 15%.

skill3.name: 'Black Rabbit!'
skill3.description: Inflicts 127.2% attack damage to all enemy targets, removes 2 buff from the target, and all allies gain Attack Buff for 2 rounds.

specialEq.skillEffect: After 3 ally rounds (except self), gain 100% dual attack chance. After the dual attack, clear dual attack chance. (This effect happens regardless if a dual attack happens inbetween the 3 rounds. Can't be stacked.) When using [Dual Frenzy] for a followup, dual attack or counterattack, increase damage by 20%.

skill1.name: Axe Cat Slash
skill1.description: Blue jumps and slashes the enemy, causing 106% damage to a single enemy target, with a 50% chance of causing Defense Down. Lasts for 1 round.

skill2.name: Axe Cat Aid
skill2.description: Increases the chance of dual attack by 5%. When launching a dual attack, the chance of [Axe Cat Slash] causing Defense Down is increased by 25%.

skill3.name: Axe Cat Dance
skill3.description: Blue launches a fierce attack, causing 190.8% damage to a single enemy target, with a 75% chance to cause Slow for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Light Splitter
skill1.description: Inflicts 84.8% damage to a single enemy target. If a critical strike is triggered, the cooldown of all your own skills will be reduced by 1 round.

skill2.name: Hacking Ray
skill2.description: Caroline emits cathode electron rays, causing 130.9% damage to a single enemy target; there is a 50% chance of using [Light Splitter] when a critical strike occurs.

skill3.name: Controlling the Limits
skill3.description: Caroline releases electricly charged ions across the formation, reducing the cooldown of all skills for 3 rounds for an ally except herself; and granting herself an Extra Turn.

skill1.name: Surprise Attack!
skill1.description: Cathy uses her giant claws to attack the enemy, causing 95.4% damage to a single enemy target. There is a 50% chance to cause Shock to the target for 2 rounds. If the target already has Shock, it will cause 2 Shock for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Frantic Scratch!
skill2.description: Inflicts 148.4% damage to a single enemy target, dispels 1 buff from the target, and ignores hit status to cause 2 to 4 Shock to the target for 2 rounds. At the same time, there is a 5% chance of using [Unavoidable!] as a follow-up attack.

skill3.name: Unavoidable!
skill3.description: Cathy exerts her full strength, inflicts 152.6% damage to a single enemy target, prolongs all Debuffs on the target for 1 round, and then Detonates the target's Shock debuffs.

skill1.name: Precision Shot
skill1.description: Cerulean demonstrates superb shooting skills, causing 85.9% damage to a single enemy target; when the target has Slow, own buffs are extended for 1 round.

skill2.name: Rapid-Fire
skill2.description: Cerulean fires on a single target continuously causing 132.5% damage, repelling target's action bar by 30%, and has a 75% chance of causing Slow for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Stagnant Scatter
skill3.description: Cerulean leaps into the air, causing 94.6% damage to all enemy targets, giving all allies Speed Buff for 2 rounds, and at the same time boosts her own action bar by 40%.
upgrades: Action bar gain is increased by 10%

skill1.name: Kasaya Cut
skill1.description: Cut the opponent with a crimson blade, causing 100.7% damage to a single enemy target. When a critical strike is triggered, the critical strike damage of this attack is increased by 20%.

skill2.name: Bloody Flick
skill2.description: Destroy the opponent's defense, causing 95.4% damage to the single enemy target. If a critical strike is triggered, the target's debuffs will be extended by 1 round. If a critical strike is triggered when Chihaya attacks, the cooldown of all her skills will be reduced by 1 round.

skill3.name: Nitenichiryuu
skill3.description: A series of continuous wave-like slashes, causing multiple stages of damage to a single enemy target with a total of 144.2% damage, and causing Defense Down to the target, lasting for 2 rounds. When a critical strike is triggered, the critical strike damage of this attack is increased by 50% and grants herself an Extra Turn.

skill1.name: Rend Technique
skill1.description: Launch a fierce assault on the enemy, causing 95.4% damage to a single enemy target. If you are Stealthed, your damage will be increased by 33%; if you trigger a critical strike, you will advance your own 30% action bar.

skill2.name: Stealth Technique
skill2.description: If you have no debuff at the beginning of your turn, you have an 80% chance of granting yourself an Crit Up for 1 round; if you have no debuff at the end of your own round, you have an 80% chance of granting yourself Speed Buff, lasts 1 round.

skill3.name: Shadow Weave Technique
skill3.description: Use spines and spurs to kill the enemy, causing 152.6% damage to a single enemy target and grants herself Stealth for 2 rounds. This attack can't be counterattacked. If the target is killed, it will cause Silence to all enemy targets for 1 round.

skill1.name: Guided Bombing
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% attack damage on a single enemy target. In siege form, deal 31.8% additional damage of own attack power, and the additional damage penetrates 70% of the target's defense. In special form, there is a 50% chance of causing an Anti-Heal debuff, lasts for 2 rounds. For every 1% of the target's health lost, the damage is increased by 0.15%.
upgrades: Additional DMG increased by 10%/Anti-Heal chance increased by 10%
Additional DMG increased by 20%/Anti-Heal chance increased by 15%

skill2.name: Sweeping Mode
skill2.description: Switch between siege form and special form, extend all buffs by 1 round, and get an Extra Turn. Siege Form: Attacks adds 2.7% of the target's current health as extra damage. Special Form: Each attack advances her own action bar by 10%
upgrades: DMG increased by 1%/Action bar boost increased by 1%
DMG increased by 2%/Action bar boost increased by 2%
DMG increased by 2%/Action bar boost increased by 2%

skill3.name: Total Missile Launch
skill3.description: In siege form, deal 70.5% of attack + 3% of the target's maximum health as damage to all enemy targets, and the attack penetrates 50% of the target's defense. In special form, deal 146% of attack damage to a single enemy target. For every 1% of the target's health lost, the damage is increased by 0.5%. When the target is killed, gain an extra turn.

skill1.name: Golden Corvus' Rifle
skill1.description: Corax uses a large-caliber jet gun to attack the enemy, causing 76.3% damage to a single enemy target. Every 1 point of her speed increases the damage by 0.075%; at the same time, repels the target action bar by 15%. When you are Stealthed, an additional 25% of the target action bar will be repelled.

skill2.name: Supressing Fire
skill2.description: Inflicts 114.5% damage to a single enemy target, and increases the damage by 0.075% for every 1 point of speed. At the same time, grants herself a Speed Buff for 2 rounds. When you are Stealthed, you will additionally use the [Golden Corvus' Rifle] to attack.

skill3.name: Corvus' Claw
skill3.description: Uses [Corvus' Claw] to melee attack, causing 143.1% damage to a single enemy target, increasing the damage by 0.1125% for every 1 point of speed; causing the target to be Stunned for 1 round; grants herself Stealth and a Barrier equal to 120% of her attack for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Saw Slash
skill1.description: Dean revs her chainsaw, causing damage equal to 53% of attack power + 79.5% of own defense to a single enemy target; giving herself Defense Buff for 1 round.

skill2.name: Risk Taker
skill2.description: When being attacked, there is a 15% chance that the attacker will be Provoked for 1 round.

skill3.name: Inferno Saw
skill3.description: Dean cranks it to maximum horsepower to attack the enemy, causing damage equal to 106% of attack power + 159% of own defense as damage to a single enemy target; if the target’s health is lower than 30% of the maximum health, [Inferno Saw's] damage increased by 4 times. When Dean uses [Inferno Saw] and kills an enemy, she will gain Rejuvenation for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: 20mm Gatling Gun
skill1.description: Della fires, causing damage equal to 106% attack power + 5.3% of own maximum health to a single enemy target, with a 35% chance of causing Slow on the target, lasting 2 rounds. There is a 50% chance of reducing [Tooth For A Tooth] cooldown by 1 round.

skill2.name: Tooth For A Tooth
skill2.description: Inflicts damage equal to 106% attack power + 3.2% of own maximum health to all enemy targets, with a 10% chance of causing Stun for 1 round. When being attacked, there is a 20% chance of counterattacking the enemy. If [Tooth For A Tooth] is available during counterattack, use [Tooth For A Tooth] instead. If [Tooth For A Tooth] is on cooldown during counterattack, the cooldown time of all your abilities will be reduced by 1 round.

skill3.name: Magazine Dump
skill3.description: Della unloads until the barrel is overheated, causing damage equal to 84.8% attack power + 10.6% of own maximum health to all enemy targets, with a 35% chance to cause Stun to all targets, lasting for 1 round.

skill1.name: Inspiring Needle
skill1.description: Inflicts 66.8% damage to a single enemy target, and has a 15% chance of causing Stun to the target for 1 round.

skill2.name: Injection
skill2.description: Recover health equal to 21.2% of the target's maximum health for a single ally other than yourself, Cleanse the target, and grant 1-2 Random Buffs to the target.

skill3.name: Therapeutic Fountain
skill3.description: Heal all allies equal to 21.2% of own maximum health, and grant 1-2 Random Buffs to the targets.

skill1.name: Blossoming Starlight
skill1.description: Erica uses the [Tyrant Star] to emit a stream of light particles, causing 76.3% damage to a single enemy target, and there is a 25% chance to dispel 1 buff off the target. If you have a buff, enhance [Blossoming Starlight]. Blossoming Starlight: Inflicts 76.3% damage to all enemy targets, and has a chance to dispel 1 buff off the targets.

skill2.name: Resonating Star
skill2.description: Any repel effect on the action bar Erica receives is reduced by 80%; when she is attacked, she boosts the action bar by 10% for a random ally.

skill3.name: Meteorite Blast
skill3.description: Erica lifts the restriction of [Tyrant Star] and attacks the enemy with maximum power, causing 104.9% attack damage to all enemy targets. There is a 60% chance of causing Silence to the targets for 2 rounds. Grant herself a Speed Buff for 1 round.

skill1.name: Spider Howitzer
skill1.description: Feidy launches a grenade, causing damage equal to 76.3% attack power + 5.1% of own maximum health to a single enemy target. In Guard Mode, after inflicting damage, the ally with the lowest proportion of health will be given a Barrier equal to 15% of their own maximum health for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Spider Thundermine
skill2.description: Release spider mines to the enemy, causing 80.6% damage to all enemy targets, cause Anti-Heal for 2 rounds, and an 80% chance to shorten the duration of the target's buffs by 2 rounds. In Guard Mode, enhance buff reduction effect to: 80% chance to Dispel all the target's buffs.

skill3.name: Guard Mode
skill3.description: Feidy enters Guard Mode, Cleanses all allies, and increases energy value by 100 [Max: 100]. In Guard Mode, the damage taken by all allies is reduced by 15%. Decrease the energy value by 20 when attacked, and reduce the energy value by 10 when an ally is attacked. When the energy value returns to 0, Guard Mode ends.

skill1.name: Standard Shot
skill1.description: Inflicts 95.4% damage to a single enemy target. If a critical strike is triggered, this skill will increase the damage by an additional 30%.

skill2.name: Point Blank Shot
skill2.description: Inflict 133.6% damage to a single enemy target, with a 75% chance of causing Defense Down for 2 rounds; a 50% chance of causing Stun for 1 round.

skill3.name: Edge of the Light
skill3.description: Inflicts 67.8% damage to all enemy targets, and grants all allies Crit Up for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Hidden Blade
skill1.description: Inflict 106% damage on a single enemy target, with a 35% chance of causing Defense Down to the target, lasting for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Severing the Air
skill2.description: Inflicts 95.4% damage to all enemy targets. When the target has a buff, the damage is increased by 15%; dispel 1 buff on the target and extends all her buffs by 1 round; additionally there is a 50% chance to cause Silence to a random enemy target for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Overloaded Assault
skill3.description: Inflict 201.4% damage to a single enemy target. When the target has a buff, the damage is increased by 20%; all the buffs on the target are removed, gain Speed Buff for 2 rounds; if you already have that, gain Greater Speed Buff instead.

skill1.name: Blooming Silver Moon
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% damage on a single enemy target, with a 35% chance of causing 2 Shock for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Victorious Aura
skill2.description: Ginga cooperates with her Shikigami to attack the target, causing 132.5% damage to the single enemy target, and a 85% chance of causing Shock for 2 rounds. If the target has Shock after the attack, [Blooming Silver Moon] will be used additionally. When an additional attack is added, the chance of triggering Shock is increased to 100%.

skill3.name: Shikigami 'Lord Hakuzousu'
skill3.description: Ginga cooperates with her Shikigami to perform a powerful attack, causing 180.2% damage to a single enemy target. Each debuff on the target will increase the damage by 20%.

skill1.name: Purify
skill1.description: Goya uses flames to purify evil, causing 106% damage to a single enemy target, and has a 25% chance of causing Burn. Lasts for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Pray
skill2.description: Goya prays to the gods, when she is attacked, gains Attack Buff for 2 rounds. This skill is triggered once every 3 rounds.

skill3.name: Execute
skill3.description: Goya uses the blade in the prosthetic arm for close combat, causing 143.1% damage to a single enemy target. There is a 75% chance to cause Anti-Heal, Burn and Defense Down, lasting for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Free Firing
skill1.description: Grace fires down range, causing 121.9% damage to a single enemy target. If a critical strike is triggered, the cooldown of all her skills will be reduced by 1 round.

skill2.name: Survival Instinct
skill2.description: Your own Critical Strike Chance and Crit Resistance are increased by 30%; when an attack triggers a critical strike, advance own action bar by 20%.
upgrades: Increase Critical Strike Chance and Crit Resistance by 5%
Increase Critical Strike Chance and Crit Resistance by 5%
Increase Critical Strike Chance and Crit Resistance by 10%

skill3.name: White Phosphorous Bombs
skill3.description: Grace releases all of her incendiary bombs, causing 106% damage to all enemy targets. For every 1% of health lost on targets, the damage increases by 0.2%. If a critical strike is triggered, this skill will increase its damage by an additional 30%. The cooldown of this skill is reset when a target is killed.

skill1.name: Thermal Blade 'Ardent Teeth'
skill1.description: Grey uses 'Ardent Teeth' to attack the enemy, causing 111.3% damage to the single enemy target. There is a 35% chance to cause Provoke, lasts for 1 round.

skill2.name: Knawing Teeth
skill2.description: Inflicts 167% damage to a single enemy target with an 80% chance of causing Anti-Heal, which lasts for 2 rounds. At the same time, repel the target's action bar by 30%.

skill3.name: Shoulder Cannon
skill3.description: Inflicts 74.2% damage on all enemy targets, with a 50% chance to cause Attack Down for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Impeding Shot
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% damage on a single enemy target and restore health equal to 7% of own maximum health towards the ally with the lowest amount health.

skill2.name: Restoration Grenade
skill2.description: Hearin restores the confidence of her students and gives all allies Rejuvenation for 2 rounds, and restores all allies health equal to 30% of health they've lost. Cleanse the ally with the lowest proportional health and advance their action bar by 35%.

skill3.name: Repleneshment Request
skill3.description: Hearin asks the students to regroup, Cleanses all allies, restores all allies health based off 35% of own max health, advance her own action bar by 50% and advances allies action bar by 15%.

specialEq.skillEffect: At the end of any enemy character's turn, if there's an ally with a debuff, advance your own action bar 10%.

skill1.name: Blooming Sunlight
skill1.description: Hokutou attacks the target, causing 90.1% damage to a single enemy target. For every 1% of its health lost, the damage is increased by 0.12%. There is a 35% chance to cause Blind for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Defy Death
skill2.description: Shikigami will protect Hokutou from a fatal attack. When Hokutou receives lethal damage, the damage is negated and the cooldown of 'Kuro Gongen' is reset. After this effect is triggered, [Blooming Sunlight] will cause 90.1% of the damage to all enemies, but it will not trigger a dual attack. This effect can be triggered once every 8 rounds.

skill3.name: Shikigami 'Kuro Gongen'
skill3.description: Hokutou cooperates with her Shikigami to attack the target, causing 162.2% damage to a single target. For every 1% of its life lost, the damage is increased by 0.3%, and causing the target to be Stunned for 1 round.

skill1.name: Prelude
skill1.description: Iberis attacks a single enemy target, causing 106% attack damage. There is a 35% chance to give a random ally a Random Buff for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Wide Area Hymn
skill2.description: Iberis uses sound waves to protect allies and grants all allies a Barrier equal to 100% of each own's attack power and Resistance for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Revolving Tune
skill3.description: Iberis uses sound waves to attack the enemy, causing 75.5% damage to all enemy targets, and has a 60% chance of causing Stun for 1 round, and a 60% chance of causing Restricted for 1 round.

skill1.name: Blazing Ambition
skill1.description: Ivey hits the enemy hard, causing 106% damage to the single enemy target. For every 1% of target's missing health, the damage increases by 0.5%; there is a 30% chance to cause Buff Block for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Ore Manufactoring
skill2.description: Ivey maintains composure by drinking their factions special motor oil, granting herself Extra Turn, and giving herself Crit Up, lasting for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Proof of Loyalty
skill3.description: Ivey throws her axe, causing 127.2% damage to a single enemy target. For every 1% of the target’s missing health, the damage increases by 0.5%; there is a 50% chance to cause Defense Down and Anti-Heal, that lasts for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Judgement Obstruction
skill1.description: Inflicts 116.6% damage to a single enemy target and repel 15% of the action bar.

skill2.name: Reversal Sweep
skill2.description: Inflicts 74.2% damage to all enemy targets and repel 20% of the enemies action bar. Inflict Attack Down on all targets for 1 round. Every time you successfully repel a targets action bar, advance your own action bar by 20%.

skill3.name: Severing the Darkness
skill3.description: Inflicts 169.6% damage on a single enemy target, removes all buffs from the target, and causes Slow for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Breakthrough Thrust
skill1.description: Inflicts 95.4% damage to a single enemy target, and increases the damage by 0.075% per 1 point of speed. There is a 35% chance to cause Blind for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Reflective Coating
skill2.description: Evasion increased by 35%. When she successfully evades, gives Stealth for 1 round, and reduces the cooldown of own skills by 1 round.

skill3.name: Emergency Seal
skill3.description: Inflicts 162.2% damage to a single enemy target, increases the damage by 0.15% for every 1 point of speed, and increases the cooldown of target's skills by 1 round.

skill1.name: Cat's Flash
skill1.description: Inflict 95.4% damage to the single enemy target. This attack will be counted as having elemental advantage.

skill2.name: Cat's March
skill2.description: Each attack will increase Katie's skill damage, stacking up to 5 times; Katie's attack will randomly repel the target's action bar by 15% or advance her own action bar by 20%.

skill3.name: Cat's First Gate 'Round-trip'
skill3.description: Katie uses her dexterous posture to attack the enemy, causing 159% damage to a single enemy target. For every 1% of the target's health lost, damage increases by 0.5%.

skill1.name: Falling Sakura
skill1.description: Inflict 106% damage on a single enemy target, with a 75% chance to Cleanse 1 debuff off an ally that has a debuff.

skill2.name: Sakura's Protection
skill2.description: Heal 26.5% of the target's maximum health for a single ally, and grant Rejuvenation for 3 rounds.

skill3.name: Circulating Sakura
skill3.description: Restores 21.2% of the target's maximum health for all allies, and grants Speed Buff and Defense Buff for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Break Apart
skill1.description: Kurumi swings with the power of crushing boulders, causing 106% damage to a single enemy target. For every 1% of own health lost, damage is increased by 0.5%. Heal 35% of the damage dealt.

skill2.name: Dauntless
skill2.description: Kurumi is full of enthusiasm. When she takes fatal damage, put health to 1 and gain Immortality for 1 round. This skill can only activate once every 9 rounds. When receiving a critical attack, reduce the cooldown of all your skills by 1 round.

skill3.name: Mountain Collapse
skill3.description: Kurumi swings with all her strength to dispel 2 buffs, then cause 135.2% damage to a single enemy target. For every 1% of own health lost, damage increases by 0.5%.

skill1.name: Warming Up
skill1.description: Inflicts 95.4% damage to a single enemy target, restores health equal to 12% damage dealt, and has a 20% chance of causing the Attack Down, lasting for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Butterfly Stance
skill2.description: Critical strike is guaranteed when all your skills hit. When attacked, the cooldown of [Ending Break] is reduced by 1 round, and the attack on your own turn, reduces it by 2 rounds. When [Ending Break] is on cooldown, damage received is reduced by 10%. After being attacked and before the end of the next round, your normal attack deals damage to all enemies.

skill3.name: Ending Break
skill3.description: Inflicts 133.6% damage to all enemy targets, with a 75% chance of causing Anti-Heal, for 2 rounds. When the battle begins, this skill starts at max cooldown.

skill1.name: Sword Skill 'Shattering Wind'
skill1.description: Maika uses her cherished blade 'Shan', causing damage equal to 106% attack power + 4.2% of own maximum health to a single enemy target. There is a 20% chance to cause Stun the target for 1 round.

skill2.name: SevenS Martial Spirit
skill2.description: When an ally is attacked, advance said ally's action bar by 5%; when Maika is attacked, advance all alies action bar by 10%.

skill3.name: Sword Skill 'Guren's Dance'
skill3.description: Maika uses her marvelous sword skills, causing damage equal to 84.8% attack power + 6.4% of own maximum health to all enemy targets; grants all allies Attack Buff for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Gentle Peck
skill1.description: Release 'Velvet' to cause 106% damage to a single enemy target. There is a 50% chance to Cleanse 1 debuff from a random ally.

skill2.name: Spread Wings
skill2.description: 'Velvet' releases a special aura, Cleansing 1 debuff on all allies, and restores 10% of the ally's maximum health. Grants herself Speed Buff for 1 round.

skill3.name: Feather Fall
skill3.description: Restore 40% of an ally's maximum health, Cleanses all debuffs and grants Immunity for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Guide to Etiquitte
skill1.description: Inflict 90.6% damage to a single enemy target, with a 25% chance of causing Silence to the target, lasting for 1 round. If the target is Marked, the chance of causing Silence is increased by 25%.

skill2.name: Maid's Principle
skill2.description: At the beginning of your own round, there is an 80% chance to Mark an enemy for 2 rounds. At the beginning of your own round, if there is already a target Marked, give yourself Hit Up for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: King Welcoming
skill3.description: Inflict 171.7% damage on a single enemy target. There is an 80% chance to Stun the target for 2 rounds. If the target is Marked, it will become 80% chance to Stun the target for 2 rounds and Dispel 2 buffs off the target.

skill1.name: Electromagnetic Railgun
skill1.description: Michelle launches an electromagnetic railgun shot on her shoulder, causing 111.3% damage to a single enemy target, with a 35% chance of causing Burn, for 2 rounds. After the attack, if the target has a Burn, the cooldown of [All Armed Fire] will be reduced by 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Armed Preparation
skill2.description: After using [All Armed Fire], if there is an enemy target with a Burn, [Armed Preparation] will be used additionally. [Armed Preparation]: Give all allies Attack Buff for 2 rounds and advance your own action bar by 35%.

skill3.name: All Armed Fire
skill3.description: Inflicts 90.1% damage to all enemy targets, and has a 70% chance of inflicting 2 Burns on the target for 2 rounds.

specialEq.skillEffect: All Armed Fire gains the effect: There is an 85% chance to dispel 1 buff off the target, which takes precedence over the Burn status. If an enemy has a Burn, gain 16% damage reduction and increase damage by 20%. If all enemies have a Burn, gain 30% damage reduction. Only the highest % damage reduction will apply.

skill1.name: Raptor Claw
skill1.description: Milvius launches an attack on the enemy, causing 106% damage to a single enemy target, and has a 50% chance of causing Blind to the target, which lasts for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Laceration Cannon
skill2.description: Milvus deploys her combined cannon, causing 84.8% damage to all enemy targets. This attack will be counted as having elemental advantage, and the cooldown of this skill is reset when the target is killed.

skill3.name: Raptor's Trial
skill3.description: Milvus launches an attack from a high altitude, causing 111.3% damage to all enemy targets, with a 70% chance to cause Defense Down, lasts for 2 rounds and a 70% chance to cause Paralyzed, lasts for 1 round; advance the action bar by 30%.

specialEq.skillEffect: Lowers the cooldown of [Laceration Cannon] by 1 round. Also has a 100% chance to lower the cooldown of [Raptor's Trial] when used.

skill1.name: Fire For Protection
skill1.description: Morris quickly attacks a single enemy target causing 106% damage, with a 35% chance of causing Blind that lasts for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Emergency Mist Treatment
skill2.description: Morris activates a healing spray to restore health equal to 15% of own maximum health for a single ally, advancing their action bar by 30%, reducing the cooldown of all their skills by 1 round, and giving a Rejuvenation for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Pure Cure
skill3.description: Morris’s cuteness makes everyone rejuvenate. Cleanses and restores health equal to 31.8% of own maximum health for all allies.

skill1.name: Conventional Fire
skill1.description: Neisa shoots the enemy with a gun, causing 151.1% damage to a single enemy target, and restores health equal to 10% of damage dealt to an ally with the lowest proportional health.

skill2.name: Strike and Shoot
skill2.description: Inflicts 120.8% damage to all enemy targets, and restores health equal to 8% of damage dealt to all allies.

skill3.name: Natural Mist
skill3.description: Neisa forges a spray into the sky, granting Invincible to an ally, lasting for 1 round, and restoring health equal to 100% of own attack power; grant self Attack Buff for 2 round and grant self an Extra Turn.

skill1.name: Lazurite Blade
skill1.description: Deal damage equal to 76.3% attack power + 57.2% own defense to a single enemy target with a 35% chance to cause Provoke for 1 round.

skill2.name: Lazurite Sphere
skill2.description: Gives all allies a Barrier equal to 60% of their own defense for 3 rounds. Lazulite Sphere's Passive: When Nemophila is on the field, damage taken for all allies will be reduced by 10% when critically struck. At the end of own turn, she will restore 5% health to all allies.

skill3.name: Lazurite's Brilliance
skill3.description: Nemophila continuously attacks all enemies, granting herself Defense Buff for 2 rounds and causes damage equal to 28.6% attack power + 47.7% own defense. Has an 85% of causing Blind for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Sacred Arclight
skill1.description: Nina wields a blade-shaped wand, causing 127.2% damage to a single enemy target, with a 50% chance of causing Buff Block to the target for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Daybreak Form
skill2.description: Nina gathers thunder and light on the wand, resets the cooldown of [Final Daybreak], grants Extra Turn, and grants herself Attack Buff for 2 and Crit Damage Buff rounds.

skill3.name: Final Daybreak
skill3.description: Nina adjusted the output power of the wand to the maximum output, causing 181.3% damage to the single target. [Final Daybreak's] hit rate is increased by an additional 50%. When killing the target, reduce the cooldown of [Daybreak Form] by 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Powerful Stream Striker
skill1.description: Nio uses a silver jet gunblade to attack the enemy, causing damage equal to 95.4% attack power + 4.2% of own maximum health to a single enemy; and granting herself Defense Buff for 1 round.

skill2.name: Lark Seeker
skill2.description: Inflict damage equal to 127.2% attack power + 6.4% of own maximum health to a single enemy. There is a 60% chance of causing Defense Down for 2 rounds, and a 60% chance of causing Provoke on the target for 1 round.

skill3.name: Lightning Stream Cannon
skill3.description: Nio drives the silver jet gunsword to its maximum power, causing damage equal to 95.4% attack power + 4.2% of own maximum health to all enemy targets, gives herself a Barrier equal to 25% of her maximum health for 2 rounds and grants all allies Attack Buff for 2 rounds.

specialEq.skillEffect: Increase the Defense Down chance of [Lark Seeker] by 25%.

skill1.name: AR Mode
skill1.description: Uses 'Renegade' for rapid shooting, causing 95.4% damage to a single enemy target, and increases the damage by 0.075% per 1 point of speed. There is a 35% chance to cause Defense Down for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: UAV 'Cat Ball'
skill2.description: Maru-nya will assist in processing battlefield information and improve Onean's combat ability. Each attack has an 80% chance of granted herself Speed Buff for 1 round. If she already has Speed Buff, there is an 80% chance of granting herself Greater Speed Buff instead.

skill3.name: SR Mode
skill3.description: After aiming, Onean deals 159% damage to a single enemy target, increasing the damage by 0.07% per 1 point of speed.

skill1.name: Branding
skill1.description: Inflicts 111.3% damage on a single enemy target, and has a 35% chance of causing Slow, which lasts for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Flame's Protection
skill2.description: When allies, including herself, use attack skills, there is a 30% chance to use [Flame's Protection] to an ally with the most debuffs. [Flame's Protection]: Clear 1 debuff, which can be triggered once per round.

skill3.name: Raging Inferno's Regeneration
skill3.description: Inflicts 85.9% damage to all enemy targets, and restores health to all allies equal to 12% of their maximum health and grants all allies Speed Buff for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Phantom Tunnel
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% damage to the main target, and 63.6% damage to all enemies outside the main target. Each 1 point of speed increases the damage by 0.075%.

skill2.name: Soul Collector
skill2.description: When you kill an enemy, you give yourself an Attack Buff for 2 rounds, and use [Soul Collector] to perform an additional attack. When you use [Soul Collector] to kill an enemy, the additional attack will not be triggered again. When an enemy target dies, advance your own action bar by 20%.Soul Collector: Inflicts 63.6% of attack damage on all enemy targets, and increases the damage by 0.05% for every 1 point of speed.

skill3.name: Region Break
skill3.description: Inflicts 90.1% damage to all enemy targets, and increases the damage by 0.1% for every 1 point of speed.

skill1.name: Unconventional Cluster Bomb
skill1.description: Quinn bombards all enemy targets, causing 50.9% damage to all enemy targets, increasing damage by 0.075% for every 1 point of speed, and a 25% chance to cause Anti-Heal for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Battle Command
skill2.description: Quinn strengthens all allies, granting Attack Buff, everyone else Speed Buff and herself Greater Speed Buff for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Guided Missile 'Stinger'
skill3.description: Quinn launches all missiles to attack the enemy, causing 95.4% damage to all enemy targets, repelling 20% of the action bar of all targets. Increase damage by 0.075% for every 1 point of speed.

specialEq.skillEffect: [Battle Command] also has a 100% chance to randomly grant all allies either Defense Buff or Immunity for 2 Rounds.

skill1.name: Scarlet's Impact
skill1.description: Pierce the enemy, causing damage equal to 70.5% attack power + 2% of own maximum health to a single enemy target; and restores health equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skill2.name: Treating Everyone Equally
skill2.description: At the beginning of the battle, give an ally with the lowest health a Barrier. At the beginning of your own round, consume 10% of your current health to grant 10% of your maximum health to an ally with the lowest proportional health other than yourself. The Barrier will last for 2 rounds. At the same time, restore 10% of your maximum health

skill3.name: Scarlet's Thrust
skill3.description: Inflict damage equal to 159% attack power + 5.3% of own maximum health to a single enemy target, with a 75% chance of causing Stun and Shock for 1 round.

skill1.name: Chemical Venom Sting
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% damage to a single enemy target. For every Corrosion on the target, the damage is increased by 15%; and there is a 20% chance to cause Corrosion, lasts for 2 rounds. When the target has Corrosion, the cooldown of all skills are reduced by 1 round.

skill2.name: Raging Chariot
skill2.description: Inflict 106% damage to a single enemy target, and increase the damage by 15% for every Corrosion. Randomly extend all debuffs on the target for 1-2 rounds. When the target has Corrosion, grant herself an Extra Turn.

skill3.name: Corroding Phantom
skill3.description: Inflicts 137.8% damage to a single enemy target, with an 80% chance of causing 2 Corrosion for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Rising Uppercut
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% damage to a single enemy target, and restores health equal to 25% of damage dealt. When the target does not have a buff, the target's action bar is repelled by 15%.

skill2.name: Lightning Fist
skill2.description: Inflicts 151.1% damage to a single enemy target. When the target has a buff, dispel all buffs off the target, and use [Rising Uppercut].

skill3.name: Rapid Fist
skill3.description: Inflicts 151.1% damage to a single enemy target, and gains Attack Buff and Speed Buff for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Sword Skill 'Monsoon'
skill1.description: Ruri jumps high and smashes down from the air, causing 106% damage to a single enemy target, and a 30% chance of causing Buff Block, lasting for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Sword Skill 'Gust'
skill2.description: Inflicts 85.9% damage to all enemy targets. This attack will be counted as having elemental advantage. If the target is killed, reduce the cooldown of all own skills by 1 round.

skill3.name: Secret Technique 'Rampaging Vision'
skill3.description: Ruri performs a secret technique, causing 101.8% damage to all enemy targets. When causing a Critical Strike to at least 2 targets, gain an Extra Turn and grant self Attack Buff for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Crane's Bow
skill1.description: Senha draws her longbow and fires, causing 106% damage to a single enemy target and restoring her health equal to 50% of damage dealt. Grant self Speed Buff for 1 round.

skill2.name: Crane's Care
skill2.description: Increase attack power by 0.6% for every 1% of health lost. When own health is less than 50%, increase own speed by 60%.

skill3.name: Senbazuru
skill3.description: Inflicts 120.8% damage to all enemy targets and consumes 20% of her current health. When you kill a target, give yourself E-Kit for 2 rounds and advance own action bar by 50%.

skill1.name: Ninjutsu 'Rising Moon'
skill1.description: Inflicts 100.7% of attack damage on a single enemy target. For every 1% of the target's health lost, the damage increases by 0.2%, and transfer 1 of the target's buffs to self

skill2.name: Ninjutsu 'The Whole World'
skill2.description: After using [Rising Moon], if the target's health value is less than 50% of their maximum health value, additional use of [The Whole World]; if the target's health value is higher than 50% of the maximum health value, then advance own action bar by 20%. [The Whole World]: Inflict 104.2% attack damage on all enemy targets. This additional attack can only be triggered during own turn.

skill3.name: Ninjutsu 'Dark Rakshasi'
skill3.description: Inflicts 244.8% damage on a single enemy target. For each 1% loss of the target's health, the damage increases by 0.3%; causes Paralyze to the target, which lasts for 1 round. If [Dark Rakshasi] kills the target, additional use of [Rising Moon]. [Rising Moon]: Inflict damage to all enemy targets, with a 50% chance of causing Shock, for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Bloody Slice
skill1.description: Inflicts 90.1% damage to a single enemy target, and has a 50% chance of causing Burn for 1 round.

skill2.name: Reserved Oni
skill2.description: Shinonome's attack will not trigger a critical strike. Increases her attack power by 0.2% for every 1% Crit Rate, and increases by 0.1% for every 1% of Crit Damage. This effect is refreshed at the beginning of any turn. Increases own Critical Strike Resistance by 80%.

skill3.name: Bloody Shadow Spear
skill3.description: Inflicts 180.2% damage to a single enemy target, and causes Burn and Defense Down for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Heaven Crusher
skill1.description: Shura slashes violently, causing damage equal to 106% attack + 10.6% of own maximum health to a single target. There is a 35% chance of causing Defense Down to the target. Lasts for 2 rounds. When in Shura Mode this attack can't be countered.

skill2.name: Triple Armor Shock
skill2.description: Inflict damage equal to 127.2% attack + 10.6% of own maximum health to a single target; there is a 100% chace of causing a Defense Down to the target for 2 rounds. When in Shura Mode, Triple Armor Shock ignores the target's Resistance; when you kill the target, you get an additional 30 energy points.

skill3.name: The Cycle of Life and Death
skill3.description: Cleanse self of debuffs and enter Shura Mode. Inflict damage equal to 143.1% attack + 28.6% of own maximum health to a single enemy target, and cause Attack Down for 2 rounds. Your own skills gain energy points, and when you are attacked, it consumes 20 energy points. Shura Mode: Enter Shura Mode and skill effects will be improved. At the end of own turn, consumes 15 energy points; at the end of any character's turn, if own energy value is 0, Shura Mode ends.

specialEq.skillEffect: While in Shura Mode, after taking damage, gain a Barrier equal to 20% of missing health. Lasts for 2 rounds. Also, while in Shura Mode, Shura can't take more than 70% of her max health in damage.

skill1.name: Shooting Star
skill1.description: Inflicts 135.9% damage to a single enemy target, and increases damage by 0.075% per 1 point of speed. When you have a Speed Buff, it will cause Defense Down to the target for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Pinpoint Breakthrough
skill2.description: Inflicts 163.1% damage to a single enemy target, and increases damage by 0.075% per 1 point of speed; grants herself a Speed Buff for 2 rounds. If you trigger a critical strike, you are granted an Extra Turn.

skill3.name: Sapphire Starfall
skill3.description: Inflicts 220.5% damage to a single enemy target, and increases damage by 0.2% per 1 point of speed. This skill will be counted as having elemental advantage towards the target. When you kill the target, extend all your buffs for 1 round.

skill1.name: Mass Energy Shot
skill1.description: Inflict 100.7% damage to a single enemy target, with a 35% chance of causing Shock. Lasts for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Instinctual Reaction
skill2.description: When being attacked, gain a Barrier equal to 60% of own attack power, that lasts for 1 round, and cause up to 2 Shock to the attacker for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Powered Energy Blade
skill3.description: Inflict 106% attack damage to all enemy targets, and causes all target's Shock to Detonate; grant herself Speed Buff for 2 rounds.

skill1.name: Reap
skill1.description: Inflicts 106% damage to a single enemy target, and has a 35% chance of causing Burn for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Sweep Up
skill2.description: Inflicts 76.3% damage to all enemy targets, causing 4 Burns, which are randomly allocated among enemy targets for 2 rounds. Every time you successfully add a Burn, advance your action bar by 25%.

skill3.name: Grim Reaper
skill3.description: Inflicts 152.6% damage on a single enemy target, and increases the damage by 15% for every Burn on the target. When an enemy is killed, restores 20% HP based off the attacked target's maximum health for all allies targets.

skill1.name: Sparkling Spear
skill1.description: Sylvia uses a spear to stab the enemy, causing damage equal to 50.4% attack power + 75.5% own defense to a single enemy target and has a 25% chance of causing Stun for 1 round.

skill2.name: Perfect Pierce
skill2.description: Sylvia charges the enemy, granting herself Defense Buff for 2 rounds, then causing damage equal to 76.3% attack power + 76.3% own defense to a single enemy target.

skill3.name: Noblewoman's Pride
skill3.description: Sylvia gathers energy in her spear and detonates. There is a 75% chance of causing Provoke to a single enemy target for 1 round, and a 50% chance of causing Attack Down to all enemy targets for 2 rounds.
upgrades: Provoke and Attack Down chance increased by 10%
Provoke and Attack Down chance increased by 15%

specialEq.skillEffect: Increase the Attack Down chance of Noblewoman's Pride by 25% and causes Provoke to the selected targeted enemy.

skill1.name: Heat Sword "General Blink"
skill1.description: Teufel swings a heated blade to chop the enemy, causing 106% damage to a single enemy target, and heals her own health by 30% of the damage dealt

skill2.name: True Master
skill2.description: Fighting makes Teufel more enthusiastic. When attacked, increases her energy value by 5 and has a 10% chance to gain an Extra Turn. When being hit, gain 10% attack which stacks up to 5 times. The stacks are removed after using an active skill. At the start of battle, gain 50 energy.
upgrades: Extra Turn chance is increased by 2%
Extra Turn chance is increased by 2%
Extra Turn chance is increased by 3%
Extra Turn chance is increased by 3%

skill3.name: Heat Sword "Black Scorpion"
skill3.description: Teufel quickly slashes and tears apart all enemies on the battlefield. Gain ATK Boost for 2 turns then deal damage equal to 127.2% ATK to all enemies with a 50% chance to Stun them for 1 turn.

specialEq.skillEffect: Gain 35 additional energy at the start of a battle. Increases [Leader's Zealotry] energy gain when attacked to 12.

skill1.name: Cat's 'Whirlwind'
skill1.description: Inflicts 95.4% damage to a single enemy target, and increases the damage by 0.075% per 1 point of speed.

skill2.name: Cat's Sway
skill2.description: At the beginning of each battle, Evade the next attack you receive. After every 2 rounds, there is a 75% chance that the next attack you receive will be Evaded.

skill3.name: Cat's Assistance
skill3.description: Advance all allies action bar by 20%.

skill1.name: Snow Bunny's Hammer
skill1.description: Inflicts 111.3% damage to a single enemy target, and repels 10% of the target's action bar. If the target is Stunned, an additional 10% of the target's action bar will be repelled.

skill2.name: Carrot Impact
skill2.description: Tony launches a carrot bomb at the enemy, causing 151.1% damage to a single enemy target, and 75% chance of causing Attack Down and Slow for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Wake-Up Call
skill3.description: Tony slams her shock hammer violently, causing 106% damage to all enemy targets, with a 50% chance of causing Stun to all enemies for 1 round. Grant self an Extra Turn when successfully causing Stun.

skill1.name: Fifth Method
skill1.description: Inflicts damage equal to 106% of attack + 2.7% of own maximum health, to a single target and there is a 35% chance to cause Attack Down, lasts for 2 rounds. When Attack Down is successfully added, gain Attack Buff, lasts 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Eighth Form
skill2.description: Inflicts damage equal to 85.9% of attack + 3.8% of own maximum health, to a single enemy target, and removes 1 buff from the target. Ignore targets Resistance and cause Critical Strike Down, lasts for 2 rounds.

skill3.name: Six Harmonies
skill3.description: Inflicts damage equal to 159% attack + 12.7% of own maximum health, to a single enemy target. This attack is a guaranteed Critical Strike, and gain Critical Strike Resistance for 2 rounds

skill1.name: Frontline Marksman
skill1.description: Valeria calmly attacks a single enemy target causing damage equal to 53% attack power + 4.2% of own maximum health + 50% of own defense, with a 35% chance of causing Defense Down. Lasts for 2 rounds.

skill2.name: A Critical Juncture
skill2.description: Valeria keeps a high level of calmness. When being attacked, there is a 50% chance of gaining Defense Buff for 1 round; if the current health value is below 50% of the maximum health value, the chance of triggering is increased by 25%.

skill3.name: Final Shot
skill3.description: Valeria fires a bullet to pierce all enemies, causing damage equal to 74.2% attack power + 6.6% own maximum health + 50% own defense; there is a 75% chance of causing Mark to targets for 2 rounds and granting self Heal-Over-Time for 2 rounds

skill1.name: Battleaxe Strike
skill1.description: Gain 1 point of energy. Deal 106% damage to a single enemy target, and has a 35% chance of causing Defense Down, lasting 2 rounds.

skill2.name: Victorious Strike
skill2.description: Verbana increases her energy by 3 when she defeats an enemy with [Battleaxe Strike] and [Violent Whirlwind]. If your energy value reaches 5, at the beginning of your turn, you will consume all your energy and put yourself into a [Power State] for 3 rounds. Power State: After attacking, additionally use [Triumphent Strike (similar to Violent Whirlwind)] causing 74.2% damage to all enemy targets.

skill3.name: Violent Whirlwind
skill3.description: Gain 2 points of energy. Verbana violently swings her battleaxe, causing 84.8% damage to all enemy targets, and a 50% chance of causing Defense Down, lasting for 2 rounds. If you are in [Power State], the damage is increased by 15% and cause an additional Defense Down.

skill1.name: Burst Fire
skill1.description: Winnie makes precise shots while maneuvering at high speed, causing damage equal to 66.8% attack power + 6.7% of own maximum health to a single enemy target; there is an 80% chance that the ally with the lowest health percentage will be given Defense Buff. Lasts 1 round.

skill2.name: Guided Missile
skill2.description: Winnie launches missiles, causing damage equal to 84.8% attack power + 12.7% of own maximum health to a single enemy target; gains a Barrier equal to 25% of her maximum health for 3 rounds.

skill3.name: Cat Returns the Favor
skill3.description: Winnie opens the capacitor to release energy particles, granting all allies Immunity for 3 rounds.
